Name: After We Collided
Desc: Based on the 2014 romance novel of the same name, this follows the love life of two young adults.
Crew: Director: Roger Kumble
Stars: Josephine Langford, Hero Fiennes Tiffin, Louise Lombard, Dylan Sprouse

Name: 365 Days
Desc: Massimo is a member of the Sicilian Mafia family and Laura is a sales director. She does not expect that on a trip to Sicily trying to save her relationship, Massimo will kidnap her and give her 365 days to fall in love with him.
Crew: Directors: Barbara Bialowas, Tomasz Mandes
Stars: Anna Maria Sieklucka, Michele Morrone, Bronislaw Wroclawski, Otar Saralidze

Name: Judy
Desc: Legendary performer Judy Garland arrives in London in the winter of 1968 to perform a series of sold-out concerts.
Crew: Director: Rupert Goold
Stars: Renée Zellweger, Jessie Buckley, Finn Wittrock, Rufus Sewell

Name: After
Desc: A young woman falls for a guy with a dark secret and the two embark on a rocky relationship. Based on the novel by Anna Todd.
Crew: Director: Jenny Gage
Stars: Josephine Langford, Hero Fiennes Tiffin, Khadijha Red Thunder, Dylan Arnold

Name: Titanic
Desc: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
Crew: Director: James Cameron
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates

Name: Twilight
Desc: Bella Swan moves to Forks and encounters Edward Cullen, a gorgeous boy with a secret.
Crew: Director: Catherine Hardwicke
Stars: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Billy Burke, Sarah Clarke

Name: Love
Desc: Murphy is an American living in Paris who enters a highly sexually and emotionally charged relationship with the unstable Electra. Unaware of the effect it will have on their relationship, they invite their pretty neighbor into their bed.
Crew: Director: Gaspar Noé
Stars: Aomi Muyock, Karl Glusman, Klara Kristin, Juan Saavedra

Name: Little Women
Desc: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.
Crew: Director: Greta Gerwig
Stars: Saoirse Ronan, Emma Watson, Florence Pugh, Eliza Scanlen

Name: Pride & Prejudice
Desc: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?
Crew: Director: Joe Wright
Stars: Keira Knightley, Matthew Macfadyen, Brenda Blethyn, Donald Sutherland

Name: Corpse Bride
Desc: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.
Crew: Directors: Tim Burton, Mike Johnson
Stars: Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson, Tracey Ullman

Name: Palm Springs
Desc: When carefree Nyles and reluctant maid of honor Sarah have a chance encounter at a Palm Springs wedding, things get complicated as they are unable to escape the venue, themselves, or each other.
Crew: Director: Max Barbakow
Stars: Andy Samberg, Cristin Milioti, J.K. Simmons, Peter Gallagher

Name: Rebecca
Desc: A young newlywed arrives at her husband's imposing family estate on a windswept English coast and finds herself battling the shadow of his first wife, Rebecca, whose legacy lives on in the house long after her death.
Crew: Director: Ben Wheatley
Stars: Lily James, Armie Hammer, Keeley Hawes, Kristin Scott Thomas

Name: Forrest Gump
Desc: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
Crew: Director: Robert Zemeckis
Stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field

Name: The Secret: Dare to Dream
Desc: A widow struggling to get by meets a stranger who subscribes to a philosophy of positive thinking.
Crew: Director: Andy Tennant
Stars: Katie Holmes, Josh Lucas, Celia Weston, Jerry O'Connell

Name: Maleficent
Desc: A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child may be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.
Crew: Director: Robert Stromberg
Stars: Angelina Jolie, Elle Fanning, Sharlto Copley, Lesley Manville

Name: You've Got This
Desc: Alex, an advertising creative wants to be a dad at all cost, but his wife is a lawyer on top of her career, and being a mother isn't part of her plans. An unexpected guest will challenge their love.
Crew: Director: Salvador Espinosa
Stars: Tato Alexander, Moisés Arizmendi, Krizia Bajos, Fernando Becerril

Name: Fifty Shades of Grey
Desc: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.
Crew: Director: Sam Taylor-Johnson
Stars: Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Jennifer Ehle, Eloise Mumford

Name: The Princess Bride
Desc: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.
Crew: Director: Rob Reiner
Stars: Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Robin Wright, Chris Sarandon

Name: Call Me by Your Name
Desc: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.
Crew: Director: Luca Guadagnino
Stars: Armie Hammer, Timothée Chalamet, Michael Stuhlbarg, Amira Casar

Name: Good Will Hunting
Desc: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
Crew: Director: Gus Van Sant
Stars: Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgård

Name: Edward Scissorhands
Desc: An artificial man, who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands, leads a solitary life. Then one day, a suburban lady meets him and introduces him to her world.
Crew: Director: Tim Burton
Stars: Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Dianne Wiest, Anthony Michael Hall

Name: Love, Guaranteed
Desc: To save her small law firm, earnest lawyer Susan takes a high-paying case from Nick, a charming new client who wants to sue a dating website that guarantees love. But as the case heats up, so do Susan and Nick's feelings for each other.
Crew: Director: Mark Steven Johnson
Stars: Rachael Leigh Cook, Damon Wayans Jr., Heather Graham, Caitlin Howden

Name: Beauty and the Beast
Desc: A selfish Prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.
Crew: Director: Bill Condon
Stars: Emma Watson, Dan Stevens, Luke Evans, Josh Gad

Name: Aladdin
Desc: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.
Crew: Director: Guy Ritchie
Stars: Will Smith, Mena Massoud, Naomi Scott, Marwan Kenzari

Name: Stranger Than Fiction
Desc: I.R.S. auditor Harold Crick suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.
Crew: Director: Marc Forster
Stars: Will Ferrell, Emma Thompson, Dustin Hoffman, Queen Latifah

Name: Ginny Weds Sunny
Desc: The film follows headstrong Ginny who meets Sunny for an arranged marriage, but turns him down, and then shows how Sunny teams up with Ginny's mother to win her love.
Crew: Director: Puneet Khanna
Stars: Yami Gautam, Vikrant Massey, Ayesha Raza, Rajiv Gupta

Name: Love, Rosie
Desc: Rosie and Alex have been best friends since they were 5, so they couldn't possibly be right for one another...or could they? When it comes to love, life and making the right choices, these two are their own worst enemies.
Crew: Director: Christian Ditter
Stars: Lily Collins, Sam Claflin, Christian Cooke, Jaime Winstone

Name: Emma.
Desc: In 1800s England, a well meaning but selfish young woman meddles in the love lives of her friends.
Crew: Director: Autumn de Wilde
Stars: Anya Taylor-Joy, Johnny Flynn, Mia Goth, Angus Imrie

Name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
Desc: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.
Crew: Director: Edgar Wright
Stars: Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Kieran Culkin, Anna Kendrick

Name: The King
Desc: Hal, wayward prince and heir to the English throne, is crowned King Henry V after his tyrannical father dies. Now the young king must navigate palace politics, the war his father left behind, and the emotional strings of his past life.
Crew: Director: David Michôd
Stars: Tom Glynn-Carney, Gábor Czap, Tom Fisher, Edward Ashley

Name: Sixteen Candles
Desc: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday becomes anything but special, as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.
Crew: Director: John Hughes
Stars: Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Justin Henry, Michael Schoeffling

Name: Stardust
Desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.
Crew: Director: Matthew Vaughn
Stars: Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Sienna Miller, Ian McKellen

Name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Desc: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.
Crew: Director: Michel Gondry
Stars: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson, Gerry Robert Byrne

Name: Her
Desc: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.
Crew: Director: Spike Jonze
Stars: Joaquin Phoenix, Amy Adams, Scarlett Johansson, Rooney Mara

Name: The Karate Kid Part II
Desc: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.
Crew: Director: John G. Avildsen
Stars: Pat Morita, Ralph Macchio, Pat E. Johnson, Bruce Malmuth

Name: Khaali Peeli
Desc: Follows a taxi driver who picks up a girl while he is on the run and ends up in a crazy roller-coaster of events.
Crew: Director: Maqbool Khan
Stars: Ishaan Khattar, Ananya Panday, Jaideep Ahlawat, Illuminati Dance Crew

Name: Crazy Rich Asians
Desc: This contemporary romantic comedy, based on a global bestseller, follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's family.
Crew: Director: Jon M. Chu
Stars: Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Michelle Yeoh, Gemma Chan

Name: The Shape of Water
Desc: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.
Crew: Director: Guillermo del Toro
Stars: Sally Hawkins, Octavia Spencer, Michael Shannon, Doug Jones

Name: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
Desc: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.
Crew: Director: Céline Sciamma
Stars: Noémie Merlant, Adèle Haenel, Luàna Bajrami, Valeria Golino

Name: Grease
Desc: Good girl Sandy Olsson (Olivia Newton-John) and greaser Danny Zuko (John Travolta) fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?
Crew: Director: Randal Kleiser
Stars: John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway

Name: A Star Is Born
Desc: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.
Crew: Director: Bradley Cooper
Stars: Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, Sam Elliott, Greg Grunberg

Name: Then Came You
Desc: A lonely widow plans a trip around the world with her husband's ashes, to visit the places they loved in the movies. The first stop on the journey changes her life forever.
Crew: Director: Adriana Trigiani
Stars: Kathie Lee Gifford, Craig Ferguson, Ford Kiernan, Phyllida Law

Name: Les Misérables
Desc: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.
Crew: Director: Tom Hooper
Stars: Hugh Jackman, Russell Crowe, Anne Hathaway, Amanda Seyfried

Name: Clueless
Desc: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.
Crew: Director: Amy Heckerling
Stars: Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy, Paul Rudd

Name: Deep Impact
Desc: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.
Crew: Director: Mimi Leder
Stars: Robert Duvall, Téa Leoni, Elijah Wood, Morgan Freeman

Name: The Blue Lagoon
Desc: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.
Crew: Director: Randal Kleiser
Stars: Brooke Shields, Christopher Atkins, Leo McKern, William Daniels

Name: Bad Teacher
Desc: A lazy, incompetent middle school teacher who hates her job, her students, and her co-workers is forced to return to teaching to make enough money for breast implants after her wealthy fiancé dumps her.
Crew: Director: Jake Kasdan
Stars: Cameron Diaz, Jason Segel, Justin Timberlake, Lucy Punch

Name: Kicking and Screaming
Desc: A bunch of guys hang around their college for months after graduation, continuing a life much like the one before graduation.
Crew: Director: Noah Baumbach
Stars: Josh Hamilton, Eric Stoltz, Samuel Gould, Catherine Kellner

Name: Practical Magic
Desc: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.
Crew: Director: Griffin Dunne
Stars: Sandra Bullock, Nicole Kidman, Stockard Channing, Dianne Wiest
